title: Which is better, GMC Patiala or GMC Amritsar for an MBBS? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let's refine the question further, In terms of location - Amritsar clearly leads here. The city is very well connected and has much to offer. Patiala now enjoys the benefits of having the CM from the city.In terms of education - Patiala, any day.In terms of Infastructure - Patiala is better here with new projects coming up. The only thing it lags at is the Hostel facility.Overall both are like opposite sides on the same coin.Select one based on your location and city preference.If this helps, How is life in GMC Patiala in terms of the people and surroundings?
Simple answer for next 5 years - GMC PATIALA …LOTS KF PROJECT COMING UP …EVEN HOSTEL ARE READY …MATTER OF MONTHS BEFORE THEY WILL ALLOT …LOCATION AWESOME ….FACULFY FRIENDLY …COMFORTABLE ATMOSPHERE..
